testcase.name: testSuccessfulCheckout

error.message:
Mockito cannot mock this class: class discount.DiscountEngine.
If you're not sure why you're getting this error, please open an issue on GitHub.
Java : 25 JVM vendor name : Homebrew JVM vendor version : 25 JVM name : OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM JVM version : 25 JVM info : mixed mode, sharing OS name : Mac OS X OS version : 26.0.1
You are seeing this disclaimer because Mockito is configured to create inlined mocks. You can learn about inline mocks and their limitations under item #39 of the Mockito class javadoc.
Underlying exception : org.mockito.exceptions.base.MockitoException: Could not modify all classes [class java.lang.Object, class discount.DiscountEngine]
